description:
Rugged, grippy and waterproof, these hiking shoes are for kids who don’t need a playground to play. The Quicklace system provide a snug fit and rides on top of a cushy and supportive midsole. The tongue keeps out pebbles, twigs and leaves kicked up on day hikes and runs around the park.

  • ClimaSalomon™ waterproofing keeps feet dry
  • Sensifit™synthetic uppers are snug and supportive
  • Quicklace™ system provides a custom fit quick and easy
  • Lace pocket on the tongue keeps tied laces safe and out of the way
  • Gusseted tongue keeps pebbles and debris out
  • EVA molded midsole for ample cushioning and rock-solid support
  • Outsoles are non-marking Contagrip® for outstanding traction
name: Salomon XA Pro V8 Mid CSWP J Hiking Shoes - Children to Youths
